title: Changing Seasons
description: In Changing Seasons, readers learn about the changes that occur with each season. The lengths of day and night, as well as the cycle of plant growth and the change in temperatures, are explained by a young narrator. Engaging illustrations supplement the text.
meta: cycle, fall, season, spring, summer, winter
Using the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Consonant Digraphs : Read words with digraph ch
Ending Er : Identify and read words with the -er ending

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
